scripts.buildLib:
babel js/libs -o js/lib.js && uglifyjs js/lib.js --screw-ie8 --mangle --compress -o js/lib.js --preamble "/*
 * Nullchan P2P imageboard engine
 *
 * Licensed under the GNU GPL v3 license: 
 * http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html 
 *
 * Source code is minified to improve load time, full source on GitHub: 
 * https://github.com/Nullchan/nullchan
 */"
scripts.build:
babel js/templates js/engine -o js/engine.js && uglifyjs js/engine.js --screw-ie8 --mangle --compress -o js/engine.js --preamble "/*
 * Nullchan P2P imageboard engine
 *
 * Licensed under the GNU GPL v3 license: 
 * http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html 
 *
 * Source code is minified to improve load time, full source on GitHub: 
 * https://github.com/Nullchan/nullchan
 */"
